about_the_game:
FEATURES

  • NO PORN?! The game contains no explicit adult content (only a few cheeky bonus scenes) making it a story for the ages that anyone could enjoy!
  • MEET OVER SIXTEEN (yes, we counted, it's actually 17!) captivating monster girls with their own enthralling stories!
  • CHOOSE TO PLAY as the all-powerful GIGACHAD, the ultimate protagonist for the manliest of men! ...or as one of the other two available protagonists if that's your thing, sure.
  • MASTER SPEED PUZZLESOLVING with exhilarating time trials that will put your skills to the test and reward you appropriately!
  • EXPLORE a plethora of unique fantasy locations!
  • ENJOY an abundance of silly and campy gags that will leave you in stitches-- or leave the developers in stitches in case you don't enjoy them...
  • UNCOVER a gripping mystery with sinister plot twists and astonishing reveals!
  • EMBRACE hours of gameplay for an utterly fulfilling experience that will leave you craving for the rumored "Monster Girl Beach Party" DLC.
  • UNLOCK an array of coveted Steam achievements - some secret ones too - to show off your knack for puzzle solving!

MORE ABOUT THE STORY & GAMEPLAY


Embark on a Hilariously Over-the-Top Adventure!
Oh no! The Monster Girls of our Kingdom have been abducted!
They are locked up in contraptions that are rumored to be the stuff of legend. Could you be the fated hero from another world, able to outwit their captors and unlock the hearts of our beloved monster girls?
Put your skills to the test and embark on a thrilling adventure across wild and wacky biomes, from fantastic forests to majestic mountains, accompanied by the cutest and quirkiest monster girls from across the isekai multiverse.

Playful Puzzles and Naughty Rewards!
Don't let their exaggerated tales fool you, adventurer! Their 'legendary' contraptions are no match for a your earth-shattering skills at a game people from your home-world might be very familiar with. But that doesn't mean it's going to be easy...
Prepare to flex your cognitive muscles with mind-bending card matches, clever patterns and devilish twists. If you're good enough, you might even earn a cheeky peek at the more playful side of these mischievous monsters.

Quirky Encounters and Astonishing Revelations!
As you journey through this whimsical world, you'll encounter a delightful cast of monster girls with their own unique personalities. From playful orcs to lovable werewolves - and maybe even some monster girl wildcards you could not expect! - each monster girl has her story to tell and a role in the grand scheme of things.
Who could actually be behind the devilish Monster Girl Abduction Operation?! Team up and uncover the mysteries of the Kingdom also known as [name redacted by the Inquisition].

content_descriptors.notes:
NO PORNOGRAPHY.
The game only contains mature content in the form of partial nudity and suggestive "ecchi" imagery.
NO explicit sex scenes or complete nudity appear in the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 / OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Solve otherworldly puzzles, rescue quirky monster girls and uncover the secrets of the kingdom together in this light-hearted isekai visual novel.
